reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747: CHEESE -  INFORMATION TO BE FURNISHED
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747: CHEESE -  INFORMATION TO BE FURNISHED
reg_info.act_under: Milk Act   Loi sur le lait

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “cheese” means cheddar cheese produced in Ontario; “marketing board” means The Ontario Milk Marketing Board; “producer” means a manufacturer of cheese. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 1. Application of Regulation
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“cheese” means cheddar cheese produced in Ontario;

“marketing board” means The Ontario Milk Marketing Board;

“producer” means a manufacturer of cheese. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 1.

Application of Regulation

content.content: 2. This Regulation provides for the control and regulation in any or all respects of the marketing within Ontario of cheese, including the prohibition of such marketing in whole or in part. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 2. Information
content.raw_html:
2. This Regulation provides for the control and regulation in any or all respects of the marketing within Ontario of cheese, including the prohibition of such marketing in whole or in part. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 2.

Information

content.content: 3. Every producer shall, in respect of each month, (a) prepare a statement in a form provided by the marketing board of the cheese produced and marketed by the producer in the month; and (b) mail the statement to the marketing board by prepaid first class mail not later than the last day of the next following month. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. Every producer shall, in respect of each month,

(a) prepare a statement in a form provided by the marketing board of the cheese produced and marketed by the producer in the month; and

(b) mail the statement to the marketing board by prepaid first class mail not later than the last day of the next following month. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Every producer of ungraded cheese shall, in respect of each week, (a) prepare a true copy of the invoice of weight listings for each vat of ungraded cheese produced in the producer’s plant in the week; and (b) mail the true copy to the marketing board by prepaid first class mail not later than the last day of the week in which the ungraded cheese was produced. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 4.
content.raw_html:
4. Every producer of ungraded cheese shall, in respect of each week,

(a) prepare a true copy of the invoice of weight listings for each vat of ungraded cheese produced in the producer’s plant in the week; and

(b) mail the true copy to the marketing board by prepaid first class mail not later than the last day of the week in which the ungraded cheese was produced. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 4.

content.content: 5. The statement referred to in section 3 and the true copy of the invoice referred to in section 4 shall be mailed to The Ontario Milk Marketing Board, Cheese Division. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. The statement referred to in section 3 and the true copy of the invoice referred to in section 4 shall be mailed to The Ontario Milk Marketing Board, Cheese Division. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 747, s. 5.
